overview: Ulisses enters the crowded informal economy market selling miniature superheroes. After losing everything, he begins his pilgrimage through the city towards the outskirts. He ends up at the landfill, where he lives with the vultures. He eats rotten food, enters into a trance and transforms into Urubucamelô, a superhero with the superpowers of the vultures.
title: Urubucamelô
